data.title: Virtual Book of Remembrance
data.meta_description: One of the most wonderful aspects of being a part of the St. John’s University family is that membership lasts forever. Our alumni are dear to us, and so the St. John’s community remembers our deceased brothers and sisters in a special way. Due to the high volume of submissions, we ask that you please submit a name only once. Thank you.
data.text:
One of the most wonderful aspects of being a part of the St. John’s University family is that membership lasts forever. Our alumni are dear to us, and so the St. John’s community remembers our deceased brothers and sisters in a special way.

Due to the high volume of submissions, we ask that you please submit a name only once. Thank you.
